text: John Mendelsohn may refer to: * John Mendelsohn (doctor) (1936–2019), American cancer researcher * John Mendelsohn (musician) (born 1947), American writer, journalist, musician and graphic designer == See also == * Jonathan Mendelsohn (lobbyist) (born 1966), British lobbyist and Labour political organiser * Jonathan Mendelsohn (singer) (born 1980), American singer * John Mendelson (1917–1978), British Labour Party politician
title: John Mendelsohn
